Package model.Strategy

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AngryShakingStrategy<TDispMsg>
    this class will create a AngryShakingball on the basis of a default one
    BreathingStrategy<TDispMsg>
    this class will create a Breathingball on the basis of a default one
    CollideStrategy<TDispMsg>
    The Collide Strategy of the ball, which collide with other balls.
    ColorStrategy<TDispMsg>
    this class will create a colorball on the basis of a default one
    CurveStrategy<TDispMsg>
    this class will create a curve ball the updateState function will change the velocity of a default ball
    DareToDieStrategy<TDispMsg>
    The DareToDieStrategy of the ball, which kill itself and other ball when collides.
    DistanceSensorStrategy<TDispMsg>
    A distance sensor strategy that will interact with a surrounding ball that is within 50
    EatStrategy<TDispMsg>
    The eatStrategy eats a collide ball and grows bigger Interaction criteria is when balls collide
    FreezingStrategy<TDispMsg>
    This strategy interacts with the distance sensor strategy The context ball will be sent on a random location on canvas, and its loation is set with velocity set to zero When the target ball moves into the distance of 50 of the context ball The velocity of the target ball will be set to zero
    KillStrategy<TDispMsg>
    This strategy "kills" a collide ball Interact criteria is when balls collide
    NoBallZoneStrategy<TDispMsg>
    This strategy mimics a no-ball zone, and it interacts with the DistanceSensor Strategy Balls The noballzone ball will not move and all of the balls that come within the distance of 50 will be eliminated
    SpawnStrategy<TDispMsg>
    The Spawn Strategy of the ball, which spawns a new ball in sometime when collides.
    StraightStrategy<TDispMsg>
    default strategy
    SwitcherStrategy<TDispMsg>
    this class will make a SwitcherStrategy ball
    WanderStrategy<TDispMsg>
    this class implements IUpdateStrategy and create a wander ball
